description: Create a crew requirement credential classification.
permissions: User must be authorized to update the related crew requirement; create is denied if no crew_requirement is set.
side_effects: Creates a crew requirement credential classification link between a crew requirement and a credential classification.
validation_notes: All required flags must be provided. Crew requirement type must be LaborRequirement. Credential classification type must be UserCredentialClassification for LaborRequirement. When the crew requirement is a LaborRequirement with an assigned laborer and effective dates, the credential classification must match the assigned laborer's user credentials.
